trans-unit.source: layout: default title: "Activities" permalink: /activities/ lang: en ref: activities redirect_from: "/developer-engagement/"
trans-unit.target: layout: default title: "Activities" permalink: /es/activities/ lang: en ref: activities redirect_from: "/es/developer-engagement/"

trans-unit.source: These activities were designed with 2 things in mind:
trans-unit.target: Estas actividades se diseñaron teniendo en cuenta 2 cosas:
Que tienen el potencial suficiente como para tener un impacto directo en el trabajo de Mozilla ahora mismo

trans-unit.source: What this means is that we don't recommend that you run the activity at this time and resources will no longer be available.
trans-unit.target: Que te dan un valor añadido a ti y a tu comunidad.

trans-unit.source: Before you jump right in: Look at your goals for the year, what do you and your community want to accomplish in each of the impact areas?
Which of the following activities best map to those goal?
And very importantly, ask yourself if by doing these activities you can expose new people to the work that Mozilla is doing and we can build new communities around them.
In order to use and build the web as a global public resource people must have the skills to read, write, and participate online.
Help us figure out which features should ship and how they should work.
Install Test Pilot and give us feedback.
Help us test these add-ons so that e10s can be rolled out to more of our millions of users.
The web needs skilled communities of makers and innovators developing and supporting robust technologies that keep it open and accessible to all.
It runs blazingly fast, prevents segfaults, and guarantees thread safety.
With your help, we want more developers to understand, use and evangelize this language in order to make the web better and more secure.
Run events to onboard developers into 3D and write some great demos.
This will advance WebVR, an open platform for virtual reality that leverages the Web.

In order for the web to stay open and accessible to all people need to feel safe online and know how to fight for and defend against the biggest challenges and opportunities that face the internet today.
trans-unit.target: Para que la web siga siendo accesible a todos aquellos que tengan la necesidad de sentirse seguros en línea y para saber cómo luchar por defendernos frente a los grandes retos y oportunidades a los que hace frente internet hoy en día.

trans-unit.source: There are multiple web content engines running on multiple devices, and sometimes with a little testing and some small tweaks to their site, developers can ensure that more users can have the full experience that is desired.
trans-unit.target: Hay muchos motores web de contenido que se ejecutan en varios dispositivos y, a veces, con pequeñas pruebas y algún que otro cambio en la página, los desarrolladores pueden garantizarles a los usuarios una experiencia completa.

trans-unit.source: Test sites and spread the message about compatibility.
